TopicTitle: See Kerbal Speciality Next to Name (or Color Code Names)

Articles.Content:
It would be really nice to see each Kerbal's specialty next to his name everywhere, that way when we are moving kerbals around and are looking for the extra pilot, we know which one to pick....

Alternatively, if putting their speciality causes too much clutter, a color code would be nice

That would be good.

Thinking instead of stars each specialty could have it's own symbol then that symbol could be used with there name.
This would be especially helpful now with that massive Kerbal MKIII tank thing.
